hero.title: Free SEO Audit: Discover What's Holding Back Your Google Visibility
hero.subtitle: Quickly identify technical issues, on-page optimization opportunities and off-page improvement areas to boost your organic ranking and generate more qualified traffic.

problem.title: Why doesn't your site appear on Google's first page?
problem.intro: You may be facing one of these common problems:
issues: Your site remains invisible on Google while your competitors dominate search results
You invest time and money in your site, but your organic traffic stagnates
Hidden technical problems block your pages' indexing without you knowing
Your content is not optimized for the right keywords targeting your audience
Your external link strategy is insufficient or poorly directed
problem.solution: A professional SEO audit allows you to precisely determine the barriers to your visibility, identify improvement opportunities and establish a prioritized action plan to propel your site to the first page of search results.

benefits.title: Immediate benefits of our free SEO audit
items: Understand why your site isn't performing as it should
Identify "quick wins" (quick actions with high impact)
Get a clear and prioritized roadmap
Make informed decisions for your SEO strategy

pillars.title: Our free SEO audit covers the 3 essential pillars of SEO

items.name: Technical SEO Audit
items.description: Technical SEO constitutes the solid foundations of your SEO. Without an optimized technical base, your content and link efforts will be compromised.
items.subtitle: What we analyze
items.outcome: A complete diagnosis of technical problems blocking your visibility, with prioritized recommendations to strengthen your site's technical foundations.

items.name: On-Page SEO Audit
items.description: On-page optimization determines how Google interprets and ranks your content. This analysis reveals how to optimize each page to maximize its relevance.
items.subtitle: What we analyze
items.outcome: A detailed page-by-page analysis with concrete recommendations to optimize your content, tags and internal linking to significantly improve your ranking.

items.name: Off-Page SEO Audit
items.description: Off-page SEO evaluates your authority and reputation in Google's eyes. This analysis reveals how to strengthen your credibility in your sector.
items.subtitle: What we analyze

sections.title: Backlink profile
points: Quantity and quality of inbound links

items.outcome: A complete evaluation of your online authority with strategic recommendations to develop a quality link profile and improve your credibility with Google.

process.title: How does it work? Our 4-step SEO audit process

steps.title: Fill out the form
steps.description: Simply enter your website URL, name, email and phone number in the form below.

steps.title: Our in-depth analysis
steps.description: Our team of SEO experts analyzes your site from 3 fundamental angles: technical, on-page and off-page. We use professional tools (Screaming Frog, Ahrefs, Semrush, Pagespeed Insights) for reliable and complete diagnosis.

steps.title: You receive your detailed report
steps.description: You receive by email a complete SEO audit report (PDF format) with diagnosis of the 3 SEO pillars, list of identified issues by priority order, actionable recommendations for each pillar, and concrete prioritized action plan.

steps.title: Advisory discussion (optional)
steps.description: We offer a phone or video conference call (20-30 minutes) to present the audit results and answer your questions about the 3 analyzed pillars.

process.note: This audit is 100% free with no commitment. No purchase or service subscription obligation.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose our free SEO audit?

reasons.title: Holistic analysis of the 3 SEO pillars
reasons.description: Unlike automated tools that mainly focus on technical aspects, our audit examines the 3 fundamental dimensions of SEO: technical, on-page and off-page, for a complete vision of your optimization potential.

reasons.title: Human analysis by an SEO expert
reasons.description: Our audit is performed manually by an experienced SEO consultant who understands your sector's specificities and your business objectives, not by a simple automatic tool.

reasons.title: Personalized and actionable recommendations
reasons.description: We don't just list problems. We give you concrete solutions, prioritized and adapted to your context (budget, resources, technical level) for each of the 3 pillars.

reasons.title: Clear and understandable report
reasons.description: No incomprehensible technical jargon. We explain each point in simple language so you understand exactly what to do, whether for the technical, on-page or off-page aspect.

reasons.title: ROI-oriented strategic approach
reasons.description: Our analysis goes beyond technical aspects to focus on what will actually generate qualified traffic and conversions for your business.

forWho.title: Who is this complete SEO audit for?

targets.name: SMEs and entrepreneurs
targets.description: You want to improve your local or national visibility but don't have the resources to hire a full-time SEO agency.

targets.name: Startups and scale-ups
targets.description: You're looking to accelerate your organic growth and reduce your dependence on paid acquisition channels.

targets.name: E-commerce
targets.description: You want to increase your qualified traffic, product visibility and online sales through organic SEO.

targets.name: Corporate and B2B sites
targets.description: You want to generate more qualified leads and strengthen your online authority in your sector.

targets.name: Existing sites losing momentum
targets.description: Your organic traffic has recently dropped and you want to understand why and reverse the trend.

targets.name: Website redesign projects
targets.description: You're preparing a site redesign and want to ensure you don't lose your existing SEO capital.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about our free SEO audit

isFree.question: Is this audit really free? Are there hidden fees?
isFree.answer: Yes, the audit is 100% free with no obligation whatsoever. We don't ask for your banking details and there are no hidden fees. Our goal is to show you the quality of our expertise to establish a trust relationship.

threePillars.question: Does the audit really cover the 3 SEO pillars (technical, on-page, off-page)?
threePillars.answer: Absolutely. Our audit is complete and covers the three fundamental dimensions of organic SEO: your site's technical structure, your content optimization (on-page) and your link strategy (off-page). This holistic approach ensures that all aspects impacting your visibility are analyzed.

timeline.question: How long does it take to receive the audit report?
timeline.answer: You will receive your detailed SEO audit report within 24 to 48 business hours after your request. For large sites (more than 500 pages), the delay may be slightly longer.

reportContent.question: What exactly does the SEO audit report contain?
reportContent.answer: The report includes three main sections corresponding to SEO pillars: a complete technical analysis, an in-depth on-page audit, and an evaluation of your off-page strategy (backlinks and authority). Each section contains personalized recommendations ranked by priority order.

subscription.question: Will I have to subscribe to a service after the audit?
subscription.answer: No. Our SEO audit has no commitment and you're free to implement the recommendations yourself. If you want to be accompanied in the implementation, we can offer our services, but with no obligation on your part.

requiredInfo.question: What information do I need to provide for the audit?
requiredInfo.answer: Your website URL, name, email and phone number are the only necessary information. If you have access to Google Search Console or Google Analytics, you can also give us temporary access for even more precise analysis, but this is not mandatory.

implementation.question: How will I implement the recommendations after the audit?
implementation.answer: The report contains actionable recommendations for each of the 3 pillars, with different levels of technical complexity. Some can be easily implemented by yourself, others may require a developer or SEO expert's intervention. We clearly indicate the difficulty level for each action.

competitorAnalysis.question: Does the audit include competitor analysis?
competitorAnalysis.answer: Yes, we analyze your main competitors to identify their SEO strategies (technical, on-page and off-page) and spot opportunities they've missed that you could exploit. This comparative analysis is included in the audit report.

finalCta.title: Ready to Boost Your Google Visibility?
finalCta.subtitle: Your Google visibility starts with an in-depth SEO audit of the 3 fundamental SEO pillars.
finalCta.description: Request your free SEO audit now and get a clear roadmap to propel your site to Google's first page. Complete analysis in 48h, no commitment.
